nodes.text: Could this be the long lost ship? If this proves to be the remnants of a wooden ship...on Mt. Ararat...what would be the argument against it being the one and only Noah's Ark described in the bible? http://abcnews.go.com/GMA/story?id=1727536&gma=true March 15, 2006- A satellite image may launch a scientific expedition to search for Noah's Ark. The snapshot captures a mysterious object on Turkey's Mount Ararat. 'I see for a 1,015 feet in length a shiplike object that has almost unbroken symmetry,' said Porcher Taylor, an assistant professor at the University of Richmond.
And you know what I saw when I looked at that photo. I saw a ridge. If that turns out to be a 5000 year old wooden boat, I will go enroll at the local synaguge, and go to services every week.
